alert.note: Alert for Pinellas (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 11 at 8:38PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Pinellas County through 915 PM EDT... At 838 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over St. Pete Beach, or near Saint Petersburg, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Fort Desoto Park, Saint Petersburg, Downtown Saint Petersburg, St. Petersburg, St. Pete Beach, Tierra Verde, West And East Lealman, Bay Pines, Gulfport, Treasure Island, Kenneth City, South Pasadena, Madeira Beach, Redington Beach, Albert Whitted Airport, Tropicana Field, Venetian Isles, Vinoy Park, Pass-A-Grille Beach and Lake Maggiore. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
